plot: A trucker and his pet monkey travel the highways of America, getting into various adventures and misadventures along the way.
plot_en: A trucker and his pet monkey travel the highways of America, getting into various adventures and misadventures along the way.
plot_es: A trucker and his pet monkey travel the highways of America, getting into various adventures and misadventures along the way.
title: El camionero y su mono
